services.piazza: Automatically preview Piazza links posted in chat.
services.golinks: Automatically reformat golinks posted in chat.
services.emojify: Include emoji of staff members when their names are mentioned.
services.groups: Automatically tag particular groups (e.g. @heads) when mentioned.
services.prlinks: Automatically reformat PR links posted in chat.
services.issues: Automatically hyperlink issues posted in chat.
